description:
Non`s mother has to go on a trip, so she leaves the lovesick girl at the Natsume house for the night. It`s the perfect chance for Non to win Ryunosuke`s heart—until, as usual, a Mishima Industries machine goes haywire and Nuku Nuku has to defeat it. But Non`s not going to let her future sister-in-law fight alone!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku no Ryouri Kyoushitsu! Non-chan Love Attack Sakusen!
Nuku Nuku`s cooking class - Non`s love attack plan
ヌクヌクの料理教室! ノンちゃんラブアタック作戦!
